str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wise, learned, cultivated, skilled, clever. Akin to saphes; wise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From suniemi; a mental putting together, i.e. Intelligence or the intellect.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Intelligent, prudent, wise, understanding, discerning. From suniemi; mentally put together, i.e. Sagacious.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From a compound of a and a derivative of tithemi; to set aside, i.e. to disesteem, neutralize or violate.
